roleset.name: bind with a bandage or ligature
roleset.note: Roleset based on internet search. Created due to parallel expansion of propbank, verbnet, and sense groupings. Verbnet class shake-22.3-2-1. No framenet mapping. Framed by Katie.

example.name: example with instrument
example.text: All the blood vessels are ligated with black silk.

example.name: binded to example
example.text: An Ncol-Notl fragment was ligated with an Xhol/Ncol digested PCR product.
example.arg: with an Xhol/Ncol digested PCR product.
